[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[4.9951,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[4.9951,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9609,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824],	
[5.0000,	4.9707,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],	
[5.0000,	4.9658,	3.9834,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9775],
[5.0000,	4.9756,	3.9785,	2.9765,	1.9795,	0.9824]])

tensoes = list(list(tensoes[j][0] - tensoes[j][i]for i in range(1, 6)) for j in range(len(tensoes)))


# Resistências totais (em Ω): 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 resistores de 300Ω e 5 resistores + 10Ω
resistencias = np.array([10, 310, , 610, 310, 10])  # Resistores de 300Ω, mais 10Ω no final para VA0

# Calcular médias das tensões para cada configuração
media_tensoes = np.mean(tensoes, axis=0)

# Incertezas nas medições de resistência (5% de erro nos resistores de 300Ω)
dR = 0.05 * resistencias  # 5% de erro na resistência

# Incerteza na tensão (4.9mV devido ao ADC do Arduino)
dV = 0.0049  # 4.9 mV de resolução

# Plotando o gráfico de V versus R com incertezas
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
plt.errorbar(resistencias, media_tensoes, xerr=dR, yerr=dV, fmt='o', label='Dados experimentais', capsize=5)

# Ajuste linear (reta)
slope, intercept, r_value, p_value, std_err = stats.linregress(resistencias, media_tensoes)
print(intercept)

# Coeficiente angular (corrente I) da reta
corrente = slope 
print(f'Coeficiente angular (corrente): {slope:.3f} A')

# Adicionando a reta de ajuste
x_line = np.linspace(0, resistencias[-1], 100)
y_line = slope * x_line + intercept
plt.plot(x_line, y_line, 'r-', label=f'Ajuste linear: y = {slope:.2f}x + {intercept:.2f}')

# Adicionando a linha passando por (0 Ω, 0 V)
plt.plot([0, resistencias[-1]], [0, slope * resistencias[-1] + intercept], 'b--', label='Linha de ajuste (0,0)')

# Personalizando o gráfico
plt.title('Tensão vs Resistência')
plt.xlabel('Resistência Total (Ω)')
plt.ylabel('Tensão (V)')
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)

# Exibindo o gráfico
plt.show()

# Calcular a corrente pela diferença de tensão (VA0 - VA1) / 10
I_calculada = (media_tensoes[-1] - media_tensoes[-2]) / 10  # VA0 - VA1 / 10Ω
print(f'Corrente calculada pela diferença de tensão: {I_calculada:.3f} A')
print(std_err)
